codes.CHQB: (Ultimate) creditor must be paid by cheque.
codes.HOLD: Amount of money must be held for the (ultimate) creditor, who will call. Pay on identification.
codes.INQR: Additional Information to an inquiry reason must be provided.
codes.PBEN: (Ultimate) creditor to be paid only after verification of identity.
codes.PHOA: Please advise/contact next agent by phone.
codes.TELA: Please advise/contact next agent by the most efficient means of telecommunication.
codes.TELB: Please advise/contact (ultimate) creditor/claimant by the most efficient means of telecommunication.
codes.TFRO: Payment instruction will be valid and eligible for execution from the date and time stipulated.
codes.TTIL: Payment instruction is valid and eligible for execution until the date and time stipulated. Otherwise, the payment instruction will be rejected.

description: Specifies further instructions for the agent concerning the processing of an instruction.
name: ExternalAgentInstruction1Code
